doc:
Max Bennett (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Max_Bennett_(actor) 0 Max Bennett (born 24 November 1984) is an English actor. On screen he is best known for playing Robert Southwell in Will for TNT, and Petritsky in Joe Wright's film adaptation of Anna Karenina. He has worked extensively in London theatre, with leading roles in the West End, as well as for the Donmar Warehouse, Royal Court, Young Vic, Shakespeare's Globe and the National Theatre. Max_Bennett ( born 24_November_1984 ) is an_English_actor . On screen he is_best_known for playing Robert_Southwell in Will for TNT , and Petritsky in Joe_Wright 's_film_adaptation of Anna_Karenina . He has_worked extensively in London_theatre , with leading_roles in the_West_End , as_well_as for the_Donmar_Warehouse , Royal_Court , Young_Vic , Shakespeare 's_Globe and the_National_Theatre .
